slides.title: Problem & Solution Overview

Diagram showing bottlenecks in traditional collectibles store operations
Modern responsive web interface showing real-time price updates across multiple devices

slides.narrative: Today we'll explore how our Collectibles Store solution transforms traditional e-commerce challenges into opportunities through modern technology and real-time capabilities.

slides.title: Architecture & Technology Stack

Technology logos arranged in a modern stack visualization
Animation concept showing real-time data flow between server and multiple client devices

slides.narrative: Our solution leverages a modern, three-tier architecture built with proven technologies, ensuring scalability and real-time capabilities while maintaining simplicity.
